title: ACT College and Career Readiness Standards - Writing
author: ACT, Inc.
description: College and Career Readiness Standards for Writing
subject: Writing

description: Expressing Judgments (EXJ)
subject: Writing

description: Show a little understanding of the persuasive purpose of the task but neglect to take or to maintain a position on the issue in the prompt
subject: Writing

description: Generate reasons for a position that are irrelevant or unclear
subject: Writing

description: Show a basic understanding of the persuasive purpose of the task by taking a position on the issue in the prompt
subject: Writing

description: Generate reasons for a position that are vague or simplistic; show a little recognition of the complexity of the issue in the prompt by briefly noting implications and/or complications of the issue, and/or briefly or unclearly responding to counterarguments to the writer's position
subject: Writing

description: Show clear understanding of the persuasive purpose of the task by taking a position on the issue in the prompt and offering some context for discussion
subject: Writing

description: Generate reasons for a position that are relevant and clear; show some recognition of the complexity of the issue in the prompt by acknowledging implications and/or complications of the issue, and/or providing some response to counterarguments to the writer's position
subject: Writing

description: Show strong understanding of the persuasive purpose of the task by taking a position on the specific issue in the prompt and offering a broad context for discussion
subject: Writing

description: Generate thoughtful reasons for a position; show recognition of the complexity of the issue in the prompt by partially evaluating implications and/or complications of the issue, and/or anticipating and responding to counterarguments to the writer's position
subject: Writing

description: Show advanced understanding of the persuasive purpose of the task by taking a position on the specific issue in the prompt and offering a critical context for discussion
subject: Writing

description: Generate insightful reasons for a position; show understanding of the complexity of the issue in the prompt by examining different perspectives, and/or evaluating implications and/or complications of the issue, and/or anticipating and fully responding to counterarguments to the writer's position
subject: Writing

description: Focusing on the Topic (FOC)
subject: Writing

description: Maintain a focus on the general topic in the prompt throughout most of the essay
subject: Writing

description: Maintain a focus on the general topic in the prompt throughout the essay
subject: Writing

description: Maintain a focus on the specific issue in the prompt throughout most of the essay
subject: Writing

description: Present a thesis that establishes focus on the topic
subject: Writing

description: Maintain a focus on discussing the specific issue in the prompt throughout the essay
subject: Writing

description: Present a thesis that establishes a focus on the writer's position on the issue
subject: Writing

description: Maintain a precise focus on discussing the specific issue in the prompt throughout the essay
subject: Writing

description: Present a critical thesis that clearly establishes the focus on the writer's position on the issue
subject: Writing

description: Developing Ideas (DEV)
subject: Writing

description: Offer little development in support of ideas; attempt to clarify ideas by merely restating them or by using general examples that may not be clearly relevant
subject: Writing

description: Show little or no movement between general and specific ideas and examples
subject: Writing

description: Offer limited development in support of ideas; clarify ideas somewhat with vague explanation and the use of general examples
subject: Writing

description: Show little movement between general and specific ideas and examples
subject: Writing

description: Provide adequate development in support of ideas; clarify ideas by using some specific reasons, details, and examples
subject: Writing

description: Show some movement between general and specific ideas and examples
subject: Writing

description: Provide thorough development in support of ideas; extend ideas by using specific, logical reasons and illustrative examples
subject: Writing

description: Show clear movement between general and specific ideas and examples
subject: Writing

description: Provide ample development in support of ideas; substantiate ideas with precise use of specific, logical reasons and illustrative examples
subject: Writing

description: Show effective movement between general and specific ideas and examples
subject: Writing

description: Organizing Ideas (ORI)
subject: Writing

description: Provide a discernible organizational structure by grouping together a few ideas
subject: Writing

description: Use transitional words and phrases that are simple and obvious, or occasionally misleading
subject: Writing

description: Present a minimal introduction and conclusion
subject: Writing

description: Provide a simple organizational structure by logically grouping some ideas
subject: Writing

description: Use simple and obvious transitional words and phrases
subject: Writing

description: Present an underdeveloped introduction and conclusion
subject: Writing

description: Provide an adequate but simple organizational structure by logically grouping most ideas
subject: Writing

description: Use some appropriate transitional words and phrases
subject: Writing

description: Present a somewhat developed introduction and conclusion
subject: Writing

description: Provide a coherent organizational structure with some logical sequencing of ideas
subject: Writing

description: Use accurate and clear transitional words and phrases to convey logical relationships between ideas
subject: Writing

description: Present a generally well-developed introduction and conclusion
subject: Writing

description: Provide a unified, coherent organizational structure that presents a logical progression of ideas
subject: Writing

description: Use precise transitional words, phrases, and sentences to convey logical relationships between ideas
subject: Writing

description: Present a well-developed introduction that effectively frames the prompt's issue and writer's argument; present a well-developed conclusion that extends the essay's ideas
subject: Writing

description: Using Language (USL)
subject: Writing

description: Show limited control of language by: correctly employing some of the conventions of standard English grammar, usage, and mechanics, but with distracting errors that sometimes significantly impede understanding; choosing words that are simplistic or vague; using only simple sentence structure
subject: Writing

description: Show a basic control of language by correctly employing some of the conventions of standard English grammar, usage, and mechanics, but with distracting errors that sometimes impede understanding choosing words that are simple but generally appropriate using a little sentence variety
subject: Writing

description: Show adequate use of language to communicate by correctly employing many of the conventions of standard English grammar, usage, and mechanics, but with some distracting errors that may occasionally impede understanding choosing words that are appropriate using some varied kinds of sentence structures to vary pace
subject: Writing

description: Show competent use of language to communicate ideas by correctly employing most conventions of standard English grammar, usage, and mechanics, with a few distracting errors but none that impede understanding generally choosing words that are precise and varied  using several kinds of sentence structures to vary pace and to support meaning
subject: Writing

description: Show effective use of language to communicate ideas clearly by correctly employing most conventions of standard English grammar, usage, and mechanics, with just a few, if any, errors consistently choosing words that are precise and varied; using a variety of kinds of sentence structures to vary pace and to support meaning
subject: Writing
